panels.description: These are instant rates, or a point in time figure for pending ops.  Greater than 10 ops or 1s weighted io time will show up on this plot.  Spikes are not necessarily a concern but may be useful to be aware of.
panels.title: High IO

panels.description: Plotted with irate.  Will capture instantaneous spikes of CPU usage exceeding 50%.   These are not necessarily alarming if not constant but can be useful to be aware of.
panels.title: High CPU

panels.description: Plots for IPMI temp sensors in warn or critical states.  This panel will be empty if there are no sensors in warn or crit state.
panels.title: Temperature Warn/Crit Value Plots

panels.description: Sum of power usage reported by IPMI sensors
panels.title: Total Power Usage (not incl storage encl)
